I think it’s something we can fine-tune after we get the permissions thing figured out.

I still think the right click option and possibly an optional permission for tabs would probably be the right move for this.  unfortunately I’ve been struggling with the optional permissions, I’ve been toying with it to get the multiple design manager tabs feature to work. problem I’ve been having is the values for permissions and for grabbing user settings are promises, meaning the data can come back at different times. making it way harder.
